summary: Mike proposed the first sprint (SP-001) focusing on updating employee profiles (US-002) and submitting leave requests (US-003) to build on the existing employee entry and search capabilities, seeking approval from the client to proceed.

actions.task: Review and approve, tweak, or pivot the proposed Sprint SP-001

backlog_deltas.title: Proposed Sprint: Directory Maintenance + Intro to Leaves including US-002 and US-003
